executable.title: Convert SPF coefficients to DWI/EAP profile (represented by SH basis or discrete samples).
executable.description: Convert SPF coefficients to DWI/EAP profile (represented by SH basis or discrete samples).

image.name: _InputSPFFile
image.description: Input Image File represented by SPF basis.

float.name: _Radius
float.description: Radius for DWI/EAP profile. \ It is b value if rspace and fourier are both set or not set.\ It is r value if only one of rspace and fourier is set.

float.name: _Scale
float.description: Scale for SPF basis. If it is negative, the default value based on typical MD is used.

image.name: _MDImageFile
image.description: Mean diffusivity Image for adaptive scale.

file.name: _OrientationsFile
file.description: text file which contains orientations. If it is not set, the output is SH coefficients. If set, the output is EAP/DWI samples

float.name: _Tau
float.description: Tau value. The default is calculated based on 4*pi*pi*tau=1.

boolean.name: _rSpace
boolean.description: If it is not set, the basis is in q-space (default). If it is set, the basis is in r-space

integer.name: _NumberOfThreads
integer.description: Number of threads. If it not positive, then the default number for multiple threads is used.
